responses.introduction: Hello, may I interest you in a... business venture?
responses.Big Footprint: With feet that size I wouldn't be able to get around so quietly...
responses.Small Footprint: They do look like a similar size to my feet...
responses.Glasses: Well yes - it's quite smokey down there, awfully irritating on the eyes.
responses.Bag: Why yes, where else do I keep all of my... items
responses.Lipstick: I find that this certain shade of rouge has an effect on humans that shocks them to their soul.
responses.Right Handed: My left hand is more dextrous for... plucking humans souls...
responses.Dark Hair: Dark hair is most befitting to my devilishly handsome looks.
responses.Rubber Duck: Aww what a cute little ducky!
